original_title: Secrets of a Mother and Daughter
overview: A widowed mother, Ava Pryce (Katharine Ross) and daughter Susan Decker (Linda Hamilton) clash over the same man, a West Coast restaurant the owner named Alex Shepherd (Michael Nouri).
tagline: A mother and daughter are having an affair with the same man. One to find love, the other to forget.
title: Secrets of a Mother and Daughter
